title: SMNTY Classics: Public Displays of Affection Politics
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Public Displays of Affection Politics
description:
How do public displays of affection compare to etiquette-friendly social kissing? How is PDA an act of love - and defiance -- in the LGBT community? And, do you love it or hate it? Listen in to learn how onlookers respond to PDA in this classic episode.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
